text:
Michael Douglas Griffin (born November 1, 1949) is an American physicist and aerospace engineer. He is the current Under Secretary of Defense for Research and Engineering. Before, he was Administrator of NASA from April 13, 2005, to January 20, 2009.
In 2007 he was included in the TIME 100, the magazine's list of the 100 most influential people.
